name: 蘇昭瑾
objective: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
schedule:
03/01  Principle  Introduction to Surface Science
03/08-03/22  From Single Crystal, Single Crystal Surfaces to Structure of Solid Surfaces
03/29-04/05  Adsorption, Bonding and Kinetics of Surface Adsorption
04/12   Get Ready to Surface Science
04/19   Mid Term Examination
04/26 Technique Electron-material Interaction
05/03-05/10  Electron Spectroscopy:
  X-ray photoelectron Spectroscopy (XPS) Auger Electron Spectroscopy (AES)
05/17  Low Energy Electron Diffraction (LEED)
05/24-05/31  Scanning Probe Microscopy:
Scanning Tunneling Microscopy (STM) Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM)
06/07  Temperature Programmed Desorption (TPD)
06/14  Surface Vibrational Spectroscopy (HREELS, FT-IR)
06/21  Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Mid Term Examination: 40%　　　　Final Examination: 40%
Absent and Tardy: 20%
